about_the_game:
In this new and exciting strategy game, you'll use your wits and your mercenaries to outsmart and defeat Gipty Goo. With only 3 action points per turn, you'll need to carefully plan your moves and use your items wisely. But don't be complacent. Gipty Goo is a highly skilled opponent, needing only 2 action points per turn.

Features:

A unique and innovative take on the chess formula
There are a variety of mercenaries to choose from, each with their own unique abilities.
A wide range of items to collect and use

How to play:

Choose your mercenaries and deploy them on the battlefield.
Use your action points to move your mercenaries, attack your opponents, or use items.
The goal of the game is to defeat all of Gipty Goo's mercenaries.

Tips and tricks:

Use your mercenaries' abilities to your advantage.
Use items to help your mercenaries or hurt your opponents.
Plan your moves carefully, and don't leave your mercenaries exposed.
Be aware of Gipty Goo's craftiness and be ready to counter it.

Do you have what it takes to challenge Gipty Goo and claim victory?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 or AMD equivalent (for best performance)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD equivalent (for best performance)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Defeat Gipty Goo, the King's favorite goblin, in the Is This Even Chess demo! Prove you're worthy of King's Challenge! Master items, navigation, and combat in 3 levels of increasing difficulty!
